analysis.key_quote: Regarding the office of the personnel management attempts to reclassify federal workers to make it easier to fire them I say stop the nonsense
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reclassification of federal workers, indicating a concern for employee rights and due process. The phrase 'stop the nonsense' suggests a rejection of the proposed changes, aligning with themes of politicization and the protection of civil service integrity.
